name: Snail breeding game
description:
Look after your snails and breed them to get more valuable rarer ones :3
Maybe try to unlock all the achievements?:D

(You can control everything with mouse
Dont click the small x button in the right corner if you dont want to lose all your game progress, it resets everything (you can use it if you run out of money tho:D))

link to game on liluo: https://liluo.io/yeyeyy/snail-breeding-game
Done for gdevelop game jam number2
